projects.title: Agentic AI Loan Application Solution
projects.subtitle: Enterprise AI Automation for Huntington National Bank
projects.description: AI Center of Excellence - Research and development to implement AI solutions across all aspects of banking
projects.extendedDescription: Developed fully automatic agentic AI loan application processor POC that chats with customers applying for loans, processes documents and natural language input, and stores data.
projects.impact: Created a system of AI Agents that can process loan-related documents with the intent of eventually automating the entire loan application process (could save thousdands of dollars and hours)

projects.title: Chatbot Prompt Engineering for WorkflowAutomation
projects.subtitle: Workflow Automation for Data Scientists at Huntington National Bank
projects.description: Data Science team - Creation and maintenance of machine learning pipelines across the bank
projects.extendedDescription: Created LLM automation workflows and architecture designs for data science team, authored wiki articles and Python libraries to enable workflow facilitation
projects.impact: Automated model documentation processing workflows for the bank's data science team by engineering a Microsoft Copilot workflow
